ValidationRule.description: ROLLUP record must have Chart of Account only
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(clcommon__Type__c,'ROLLUP'), OR( ISBLANK(clcommon__Chart_of_Account__c), NOT(ISBLANK(clcommon__Detail__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(clcommon__Expression__c)) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Record with type = ROLLUP must be associated with Chart of Account record. Detail or Expression must be blank
